comment: Existence of an image of a class. Theorem 3.17 of [Monk1] p. 39. (cf. ~ imaexg ) with weakened antecedent: only the restricion of ` A ` by a set needs to be a set, not ` A ` itself, see e.g. ~ cnvepimaex . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Feb-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
